评论概述: I have bought EIGHT (yes 8!!) pairs bc I love them sm but the stones fall out within a week
类型: Material Type: Yellow GoldStyle: Round CZ
评论详情: These are my absolute favorite earrings. Unfortunately I have had to buy 8!! Pairs of them in the last year and a half because within a month the stones start to fall out in them. I have tried silver and gold, in both designs. I was hoping maybe if I switched to a different metal, maybe my problem would be solved. Unfortunately nope. I know it seems ridiculous that I have bought these so many times with it being a faulty product. But I absolutely adore the way these look in my ears and it’s just super disappointing that they are such poor quality. Not to mention I’ve probably send 300$ min on other items from the company  Another major issue I have is I’ve tried to reach out to the company to see if I could possibly get at least ONE of my pairs reimbursed or some sort of compensation for the insane amount of money I’ve spent with the company. But I have gotten zero response from them. I also am a avid consumer of many of their other jewelry items as well. Over-all i love the brand but they have a lot to work on and if this isn’t considered being a loyal customer i don’t know what is.

类型: Material Type: Yellow GoldStyle: Round CZ
评论详情: MARK MY WORDS PEOPLE: You will not find jewelry at this price, and for this incredible quality, ANYWHERE ELSE. Trust me, I've made all the dumb purchases myself!  I freaking LOVE, LOVE these earrings! I've had them for a few years now, and they are as bright and shiny as the day I received them! Very fashion forward and trendy, I wear these more than any other pair of earrings I own.  TRUE STORY: I have purchased a few other pairs of earrings from PAVOI over the years - all through Amazon - and several years ago I started to notice a trend: PAVOI's earrings, when compared to earrings of similar cost and style that I had purchased from other companies, were/ARE exemplary in every way. I noticed PAVOI earrings never tarnished, or turned my skin weird colors. I can wear them for days on end without removing them and have zero issues. It is because of this that when I search for new earrings, I always look for PAVOI. I refuse to purchase from anyone else.
